Changes
=======

0.1.2 (unreleased)
------------------
- Do not import yaco.hghooks in install time since our dependencies are not
  available yet. Instead, move the version information directly to the
  setup.py file.

0.1.1 (2010-10-18)
------------------
- Require a specific minimum version of hghooks

0.1.0 (2010-10-17)
------------------
- Initial release
